metadata.title: RHSA-2019:2097: perl-Archive-Tar security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
The Archive::Tar module provides a mechanism for Perl scripts to manipulate tar archive files.

Security Fix(es):

* perl: Directory traversal in Archive::Tar (CVE-2018-12015)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.7 Release Notes linked from the References section.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
perl-Archive-Tar is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
